mapper.insert: insert into item values( item_seq.nextval, #{item_name}, #{seller_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_main_image}, #{item_detail_image}, #{item_explain}, sysdate, #{item_category_name}, #{item_amount}, 1)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from item )tt) where rn >=1 and rn<=8 and ITEM_ORDER_ABLE = 1
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from item order by item_add_date desc)tt) where rn >=1 and rn<=8 and ITEM_ORDER_ABLE = 1
select * from item where item_category_name=#{item_category_name} and ITEM_ORDER_ABLE = 1
select * from item where item_name like '%'||#{searchT}||'%' and ITEM_ORDER_ABLE = 1
